name: Computer Systems, Algorithms and Data Structures
description:
This is a collection of 3 online courses plus supplementary materials which cover understanding how components of a computer system interact with each other, SQL programming and number systems. The module also covers Data Structures inluding Dynamic arrays, queues and stacks, heaps and priority queues, has table/associate array, algorithms, linked lists, binary trees and binary search trees, union find/disjoint set and Fenwick tree/binary indexed tree.

To prove completion of the online courses, the student must provide a copy of the course completion certificates provided by the course provider. We do not have access to course providers assessment criteria.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete all 3 online course and review the supplementary materials to be awarded the digital badge.
